name: cpptools
description: C/C++ IntelliSense, debugging, and code browsing.

scripts.compile: yarn run precompile && yarn run translations-generate && webpack --mode production --vscode-nls
scripts.compile-watch: yarn run precompile && yarn run translations-generate && webpack --mode production --vscode-nls --watch --info-verbosity verbose
scripts.compile-dev-watch: yarn run precompile && webpack --mode development --watch --info-verbosity verbose
